</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Object </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Process an animation of 3D [[Arma: GUI Configuration]]. Command uses name defined by source property and works similar like [[animateSource]] command. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlAnimateModel''' [source, phase]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control : [[Control]] - 3D control</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [source, phase]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> source: [[String]] - common source </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> phase: [[Number]] - wanted animation phase </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control3D [[ctrlAnimateModel]] ["Close",1];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrlLaptop [[ctrlAnimateModel]] ["Lid",1];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________
